plot: Embrace yourself for one and a half hours of unprecedented journey through the streets of Yerevan and its underworld, inhabited by people, who turn this place into a mirror of the national soul with all its joyful and tragic revelations.
title: Yerevan Blues
plot_es: Embrace yourself for one and a half hours of unprecedented journey through the streets of Yerevan and its underworld, inhabited by people, who turn this place into a mirror of the national soul with all its joyful and tragic revelations.

cast.role: Hapetik /              Policeman /              Sparapet /              Indian Ambassador /              Theatre Fireman
